alert.note: Alert for Boise Mountains; Upper Weiser River; West Central Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 08 at 2:12PM MST until January 10 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow and wind expected. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 15 inches, except 12 to 24 inches in the mountains above 6000ft. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...West Central Mountains, Boise Mountains and Upper Weiser River zones. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 11 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Boise Mountains; Upper Weiser River; West Central Mountains
